nodes.bodyText: This is the one place where it seemed like we could pass a null to formLoaded as we are checking the singleton field isn't null and then calling the method again. Assigning it here means that we only deal with the one value (null or not).
Much easier to protect form null in the view model
Definitely could be expanded on but this is good enough to give us a harness to prevent a regression on this particular bug.

Haven't you shaken your fist in my general direction about tests without assertions before?! 😅
More seriously, I'm not really thinking of anything meaningful to assert and I do think it's ok.

Haha probably. Do as I say not as I do right...
But yeah I think this test would ideally check that calls aren't made but here it felt the real focus was just to make sure nothing exploded. There is a comment 😉
